scripts.css: node-sass scss/whiplash-ui.scss --source-map true -o dist && node-sass scss/whiplash-ui.scss --output-style compressed > dist/whiplash-ui.min.css
scripts.css:watch: npm run css && node-sass scss/whiplash-ui.scss -wo dist
scripts.js: cp js/whiplash-ui.js dist/ && minify --output dist/whiplash-ui.min.js js/whiplash-ui.js
scripts.dist: npm run css && npm run js
